title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
November 21, 2019
On Thursday, November 21, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 3055, the “Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2020, and Further Health Extenders Act of 2019,” which provides Fiscal Year 2020 appropriations to Federal agencies through December 20, 2019, for continuing projects and activities of the Federal Government; and extends authority for a broad range of Medicare, Medicaid, public health, and human services activities and for other matters.
